rows.label: qst202610_msg0001
rows.name:
I thought that my existence as
a weapon could cause nothing but
pain to those around me.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0002
rows.name:
But after what you told me, Rex,
I began to reconsider that.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0003
rows.name:
But after what you told me, Nia,
I began to reconsider that.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0004
rows.name:
But after what you told me, Zeke,
I began to reconsider that.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0005
rows.name:
But after what you told me, Meleph,
I began to reconsider that.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0006
rows.name:
I realize now that I could use my power
not to destroy, but to protect.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0007
rows.name:
That I could use my powers for the
good of the people.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0008
rows.name:
I wonder if it's strange of me to
think so...

rows.label: qst202610_msg0009
rows.name: No way, not at all!

rows.label: qst202610_msg0010
rows.name:
I'll help you every step of the way,
Ten'i. As a Driver... No, as a friend!

rows.label: qst202610_msg0011
rows.name: Nothing strange about that.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0012
rows.name:
I'll help you every step of the way,
Ten'i. As a Driver... No, as a friend.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0013
rows.name: I think it's very admirable.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0014
rows.name:
Allow me to help you with that goal.
As a Driver... No, as a friend.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0015
rows.name:
The only thing that's strange is you
thinking it's strange, girl.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0016
rows.name:
I should let you know that I'm 110%
behind you on this one. As a Driver...
No...as a friend.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0017
rows.name: Thank you...

rows.label: qst202610_msg0018
rows.name:
I'll do my best to live up to your
expectations, Rex.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0019
rows.name:
I'll do my best to live up to your
expectations, Nia.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0020
rows.name:
I'll do my best to live up to your
expectations, Zeke.

rows.label: qst202610_msg0021
rows.name:
I'll do my best to live up to your
expectations, Meleph.
